folder.name: Thanks
folder.keyword: Thank you very much for contacting us.
Thank you very much for your cooperation.
We appreciate your feedback, and will get back to you as soon as possible.
Thank you for your kind proposal.
Thank you very much in advance.

folder.name: Opening phrases
folder.keyword: I am writing to inquire about
I am writing in reference to
I am sorry for the delay in responding to your inquiry.
Following our phone conversation I'm sending you the request and details

folder.name: Closing phrases
folder.keyword: If you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.
Should you need any further assistance, don't hesitate to contact us.
Feel free to contact us if you have any other questions or comments.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Please confirm the delivery. Thank you.
Looking forward to hearing from you.

folder.name: Apologies
folder.keyword: I would like to apologize for
I am sorry for the inconvenience caused.

folder.name: Project Railways
folder.keyword: // javascript: (() => {{#crlf#} if (window.location.href.includes("https://geohack.toolforge.org/geohack.php?pagename=")) {{#crlf#} console.log("Click anywhere in the page to copy the coordinates & location");{#crlf#} document.addEventListener("click", function () {{#crlf#} var locationElement = document.getElementById("firstHeading");{#crlf#} var latitudeElement = document.querySelector(".latitude");{#crlf#} var longitudeElement = document.querySelector(".longitude");{#crlf#} if (latitudeElement && longitudeElement && locationElement) {{#crlf#} var location = locationElement.textContent.split("GeoHack - ")[1];{#crlf#} var latitude = latitudeElement.textContent;{#crlf#} var longitude = longitudeElement.textContent;{#crlf#} var lineBreak = "\n";{#crlf#} var toCopy = latitude + ", " + longitude + ", " + location + lineBreak;{#crlf#} navigator.clipboard.writeText(toCopy).then(() => {{#crlf#} console.log("Coordinates & location copied successfully");{#crlf#} }).catch(err => {{#crlf#} console.error("Could not copy text: ", err);{#crlf#} }){#crlf#} } else {{#crlf#} console.error("Location, latitude, longitude element(s) not found.");{#crlf#} }{#crlf#} }){#crlf#} } else {{#crlf#} console.error("Not on a GeoHack page");{#crlf#} }{#crlf#}// })();

// javascript: (() => {{#crlf#} if (window.location.href.includes("https://geohack.toolforge.org/geohack.php?pagename=")) {{#crlf#} console.log("Click anywhere in the page to copy the coordinates");{#crlf#} document.addEventListener("click", function () {{#crlf#} var locationElement = document.getElementById("firstHeading");{#crlf#} var latitudeElement = document.querySelector(".latitude");{#crlf#} // var longitudeElement = document.querySelector(".longitude");{#crlf#} if (latitudeElement && longitudeElement /* && locationElement */ ) {{#crlf#} // var location = locationElement.textContent.split("GeoHack - ")[1];{#crlf#} var latitude = latitudeElement.textContent;{#crlf#} var longitude = longitudeElement.textContent;{#crlf#} var lineBreak = "\n";{#crlf#} var toCopy = latitude + ", " + longitude /* + ", " + location */ + lineBreak;{#crlf#} navigator.clipboard.writeText(toCopy).then(() => {{#crlf#} console.log("Coordinates copied successfully");{#crlf#} }).catch(err => {{#crlf#} console.error("Could not copy text: ", err);{#crlf#} }){#crlf#} } else {{#crlf#} console.error("Latitude, longitude element(s) not found.");{#crlf#} }{#crlf#} }){#crlf#} } else {{#crlf#} console.error("Not on a GeoHack page");{#crlf#} }{#crlf#}// })();

folder.name: Music
folder.keyword: // javascript: (() => {{#crlf#} if (window.location.href.includes("https://music.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL") || window.location.href.includes("browse/VL")) {{#crlf#} console.log("Click anywhere in the page to copy the title, performer(s) & URL ");{#crlf#} document.addEventListener("click ", function () {{#crlf#} var titleElement = document.querySelector(".title.style - scope.ytmusic - detail - header - renderer ");{#crlf#} var performersElement = document.querySelector(".description.style - scope.ytmusic - detail - header - renderer ");{#crlf#} var url = window.location.href.replace("browse/VL", "playlist?list=");{#crlf#} if (titleElement) {{#crlf#} var title = titleElement.textContent; var lineBreak = "\n";{#crlf#} var performers = performersElement ? performersElement.textContent.replace(/\n/g, " | ") : "";{#crlf#} var toCopy = title + (performers ? " (" + performers + ")" : "") + lineBreak + url + lineBreak + lineBreak;{#crlf#} navigator.clipboard.writeText(toCopy).then(() => {{#crlf#} console.log("Title, performer(s) & URL copied successfully");{#crlf#} }).catch(err => {{#crlf#} console.warn("Could not copy text: ", err);{#crlf#} });{#crlf#} } else {{#crlf#} console.error("Title, performer(s) & URL not found.");{#crlf#} }{#crlf#} });{#crlf#} } else if (window.location.href.includes("https://music.youtube.com/playlist?list=OL")) {{#crlf#} console.error("In a YouTube Music album, not a playlist");{#crlf#} } else {{#crlf#} console.error("Not in a YouTube Music playlist");{#crlf#} }{#crlf#}// })();
